sen.j: 水揚げ（みずあげ）には以下の意味がある。
sen.e: Mizuage has the following meanings.
Mizuage has the following meanings.
Mizuage has the following meanings.

sen.j: 船の荷物を陸に揚げること。
sen.e: Discharging ship freight.
Landing a cargo from a ship
Landing a cargo from a ship
Also called Rikuage.
Also called Rikuage.
Also called Rikuage.
Fish catches (in fishery).
Fish catch (in fishery).
Fish catch (in fishery).
Sales volume (in the bar or night club business).
Sales (in a bar or a nightclub).
sen.cmt: Sales volume→Sales、 a→the、 night club business→a nightclub
sen.e: Sales (in a bar or a nightclub).
Earnings.
Earnings.
Earnings.

sen.j: 草花を長持ちさせる方法。
sen.e: A method to prolong the life of flowers.
A method of prolonging life of flowers.
A method of prolonging life of flowers.

sen.j: 若い芸妓に旦那がつくこと。
sen.e: A young geisha has a patron.
For a young geisha girl to have a patron.
For a young geisha girl to have a patron.

sen.j: 誤解が多いが、花街の水揚げとは異なる。
sen.e: Though commonly misunderstood, it is different from Mizuage in the red-light district.
Although it tends to be misunderstood, it is different from Mizuage in the red-light district.
sen.cmt: 誤解が多いが、の部分を修正しました。
sen.e: Although it tends to be misunderstood, it is different from Mizuage in the red-light district.

sen.j: この項目では、草花の「水揚げ」について述べる。
sen.e: In this page, the "Mizuage" for flowers is mentioned.
In this section, the 'Mizuage' for flowers is mentioned.
In this section, the 'Mizuage' for flowers is mentioned.

sen.j: 漁業における「水揚げ」については漁業備考の項を参照。
sen.e: See the remarks column of Fishery for the "Mizuage" in fishery.
See the remarks column of Fishery for the 'Mizuage' in fishery.
sen.cmt: かぎ括弧を修正しました。
sen.e: See the remarks column of Fishery for the 'Mizuage' in fishery.

tit.j: 生花の延命法としての水揚げ
tit.e: Mizuage as a method to prolong fresh flowers
Mizuage as a method of prolonging fresh flowers
Mizuage as a method of prolonging fresh flowers

sen.j: 生け花や、生花業者等が切花などが、長持ちするように施す処理のこと。
sen.e: This refers to a treatment to prolong Japanese flower arrangement or cut flowers by florists.
This is a treatment for prolonging lives of flowers arranged or cut flowers by florists.
sen.cmt: 生け花は、アレンジメントという行為ではなく、生けた花という意味として修正しました。
sen.e: This is a treatment for prolonging lives of flowers arranged or cut flowers by florists.
The following methods are typical ones.
The following are typical methods.
The following are typical methods.
Kirimodoshi
Kirimodoshi (to cut a stem diagonally).
sen.cmt: 括弧で補足の説明が必要かと思います。
sen.e: Kirimodoshi (to cut a stem diagonally).
Mizukiri
Mizukiri (to cut a stem diagonally under water).
sen.cmt: 括弧で補足の説明が必要かと思います。
sen.e: Mizukiri (to cut a stem diagonally under water).
Fukamizu
Fukamizu (to soak a weakened flower deep into water).
sen.cmt: 括弧で補足の説明が必要かと思います。
sen.e: Fukamizu (to soak a weakened flower deep into water).
Yuage
Yuage (to soak a flower covered in hot water).
sen.cmt: 括弧で補足の説明が必要かと思います。
sen.e: Yuage (to soak a flower covered in hot water).
Sakamizu
Sakamizu (to wet the back of leaves).
sen.cmt: 括弧で補足の説明が必要かと思います。
sen.e: Sakamizu (to wet the back of leaves).

sen.j: 他にも、切り口を焼く、たたく･砕く、水の代わりに酢やアルコールを使う、延命剤を使うなど、様々な方法がある。
sen.e: Other than these, there are various methods including burning or beating/crushing the cut end, using vinegar or alcohol instead of water and using a life-prolonging agent.
Besides, there are various methods including burning, dabbing and crushing the cut end, using vinegar or alcohol instead of water and using a life-prolonging agent.
Besides, there are various methods including burning, dabbing and crushing the cut end, using vinegar or alcohol instead of water and using a life-prolonging agent.
